metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35004 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the VZT longest_len valueallocation functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .vzt filecan lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open amalicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
